title: Supplements
description: Supplements: Some of my patients ask me why I don't carry supplements in my office. The answer is simple. Rather than limiting my inventory to a few different supplements for each condition, by using FullScript
cleaned_text: Supplements Some of my patients ask me why I don't carry supplements in my office. The answer is simple. Rather than limiting my inventory to a few different supplements for each condition, by using [FullScript](https://us.fullscript.com/welcome/Wawrzyniak) I have access to a multitude of products by hundreds of manufacturers. This enables me to pick the best supplement for you. Professional Grade Supplements [Fullscript](https://us.fullscript.com/welcome/Wawrzyniak) only carries professional grade supplements with high quality ingredient and manufacturing standards, so I can have confidence in all the supplements they carry. Ordering through Fullscript vs other online supplement services, ensures that your supplements are exactly what they say they are, have been stored and shipped correctly, and are never expired.
